alert.note: Alert for McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McCulloch and southwestern San Saba Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rochelle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rochelle, Sloan and Us-190 Near The Mcculloch-San Saba County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
